xnbData: target: "w" compressed: true hiDef: true readerData: - type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]" version: 0

content: #!Dictionary<String,String>
xml.p: Introduction: "...$u#$b#Hi...$u" #!String
Resort_Entering: "I see a crab!" #!String
Resort_Leaving: "I've got sand in my shoe...$s" #!String
Resort_Shore: "I'm collecting seashells... I'm gonna make a necklace!" #!String
Resort: "Aunt Marnie told me not to get burnt... But when I walk fast, it feels cool, so I think I'll be okay.$h" #!String
reject_869: "Ew, gross!$s" #!String
Mon: "Oh...Are you looking for Aunt Marnie?$u" #!String
Mon4: "Hi, Mr. @.^Hi, Ms. @.#$e#It's fun to live on a farm.$h" #!String
Tue: "What? *giggle*$h#$e#...hi." #!String
Tue6: "You can play with my dolls if you want to. Just make sure to brush their hair when you're done." #!String
Wed: "...$u" #!String
Wed2: "...Hi.$u" #!String
Wed4: "Aunt Marnie won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!$s#$e#I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!" #!String
Thu: "I'm not supposed to talk to strangers...$u" #!String
Thu2: "Miss Penny is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#She has such pretty handwriting." #!String
Fri: "... I don't know you.$u" #!String
Fri2: "Do you like my bow?" #!String
Fri4: "I like living on the farm... my favorite is the fresh ice cream from our cows' milk." #!String
Sat: "You smell like grass.$u" #!String
Sat2: "Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it." #!String
Sat8: "You're always so nice to me, Mr. @$h^You're always so nice to me, Ms. @.$h#$e#Grown-ups are usually mean and boring, but you're different." #!String
Sun: "Um... d...do you want something?$u#$e#I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.$u" #!String
Sun2: "Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h" #!String
Sun10: "Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s" #!String
